Posts.Content: Hi Knotofpeace, If you'd like more information about travel insurance, we have a list of companies that offer travel insurance to people affected by cancer on our website: www.macmillan.org.uk/travelinsurancecompanies And also some wider info about travel and cancer: http://www.macmillan.org.uk/Cancerinformation/Livingwithandaftercancer/Practicalissues/Travel/Travel.aspx Have a lovely trip! Paris, I'm envious :) Graham
Posts.Title: Easyjet plane travel - will there be a problem?
